titles.title: Prayer For The Spirit's Fruit (easy sweet tune

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May the fruit Of God the Spirit Grow in me abundantly Fruit that glorifies My Father everlastingly{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May the love of God Flow through me Like the life within the vine Give me joy That knows no measuure Showing I am Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May Thy peace Keep guard within me Peace that passes human thought May I patient be Long-suff'ring Serving as I ought{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Make me gentle In my contacts Gentle as a summer breeze May Thy goodness Grow in plenty As on fruitful trees{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May my faith In God my Father Steadfast grow In every way Rooted deep in God's Own promise Fruitful every day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Make me meek like Christ my Savior Meek when under Stress and strain Teach me Lord In all things daily Self-control to gain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May my life yield God a harvest Of the Spirit's fruit always As a branch Secure in Jesus All my hours and days{/lang-eng}
